attributes.action: Return the Elgin Marbles to Greece.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is specific to the Elgin Marbles and does not open the floodgates for cultural returns.
The new Acropolis Museum removes fears of environmental damage to the Marbles.

Our removal of them occurred under Turkish occupation.

No single act could make us more popular in Southern Europe.
